amendment.description: Amendment reduces the $124.5 million authorization for the Safety Belt Performance Grant program by $50 million to a level of $74.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to strike $50 million in incentive grants to states to enact laws to make it a primary traffic violation for occupants to not use a seat belt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
